rows.question_done:
* Did you try out parenting practices that can help your child to become the child you desire to have at 20 years.
* Did you develop family goals and objectives that will support you in nurturing the children.
rows.feedback_no: You can always find this home practice activity in our session on @data.topic.current_pract.title
rows.feedback_happy: Good job on getting you and your family to talk about parenting family goals and objectives.
rows.outro_text: To achieve your dream child in 20 years, there is need for every parent to be deliberate in their parenting and to invest time and care from the start.

rows.question_done: Did you get a chance to practice one play or fun moment from your childhood that improves your relationship with your children?
rows.feedback_no: Regularly taking initiative to do a positive practice to your child will help build a positive relationship with him/her. You can always refer back to this home practise activity in our session 4 on Attachment and Bonding - Influence of one’s own parents and positive discipline techniques
rows.feedback_happy: Good job on integrating a positive practice from your childhood to improve the relationship with your child. We have a deep and long-lasting impact on our children’s lives. These legacies may be positive or negative and are passed on intentionally or unintentionally.
rows.outro_text: Continue practicing positive things from your childhood with your child. This will strengthen the relationship you have with your child.
